```{r load_libraries}
library(polmineR)
library(duplicates)
library(cwbtools)
```


## Prune vocabulary

```{r prune_vocab}
use(pkg = "duplicates")

charcount <- corpus("REUTERS2") %>%
  charcount(
    p_attribute = "word",
    char_regex = "[a-zA-Z]",
    lowercase = TRUE,
    decreasing = FALSE
   )

vocab <- corpus("REUTERS2") %>% 
  p_attributes(p_attribute = "word") %>% 
  charfilter(chars = names(charcount[1:12]))

x <- corpus("REUTERS2") |>
  split(s_attribute = "doc_id")

dupl <- docsimil(
    x = x,
    p_attribute = "word",
    s_attribute = "doc_id",
    mc = parallel::detectCores() - 2L,
    vocab = vocab
  )
```


## Run duplicate detection


```{r duplicate_detection}
x <- corpus("REUTERS2") |>
  split(s_attribute = "doc_id")

dupl <- docsimil(
    x = x,
    p_attribute = "word",
    s_attribute = "doc_id",
    mc = parallel::detectCores() - 2L,
    vocab = vocab
  )
```


## Write to corpus

```{r get_annotation_data}
groups <- docgroups(dupl)

annodata <- duplicates_as_annotation_data(
  x = groups,
  corpus = "REUTERS2",
  s_attribute = "doc_id"
)
```


```{r encode, eval = FALSE}
regdata <- registry_file_parse(corpus = "REUTERS2", registry = registry())

for (s_attr in c("is_duplicate", "duplicates")){
  s_attribute_encode(
    values = as.character(annodata[[s_attr]]),
    data_dir = regdata$home,
    s_attribute = s_attr,
    corpus = "REUTERS2",
    region_matrix = as.matrix(annodata[, c("cpos_left", "cpos_right")]),
    method = "R",
    registry_dir = registry(),
    encoding = regdata$properties["charset"],
    delete = FALSE,
    verbose = TRUE
  )
}
```
